devdoc.author: Nazzareno Massari, Bianca Trovò
devdoc.details: Simple smart contract which allows any user to issue a bounty in ETH linked to requirements stored in ipfs which anyone can fufill by submitting the ipfs hash which contains evidence of their fufillment

params._fulfillmentId: the index of the fulfillment being accepted

cancelAntReview(uint256).details: cancelAntReview(): cancels the antReview and send the funds back to the issuer

fulfillAntReview(uint256,string).details: fulfillAntReview(): submit a fulfillment for the given antReview

params._antReviewId: the index of the antReview to be fufilled
params._data: the ipfs hash which contains evidence of the fufillment

params._deadline: the unix timestamp after which fulfillments will no longer be accepted

devdoc.title: AntsReview
